channel.title: TrilliumCraft 24/7 *PVP* *SURVIVAL* *ANTIGRIEF*
channel.description:
TrilliumCraft is a 2GB server, dedicated survival multiplayer server. We have ranks, skills/level, jobs, a booming economy, protection-stones accompanied with active admins/mods for protection against griefers; you have no worries about grief, we have tools to rollback or restore griefed areas. Chests, furnaces are automatically locked and you can lock doors with /lock. We also have shops made by players where everyone can go in and buy goods.
This server has an excellent community, very helpful players that are very experienced. We host a voice server for anyone that wants to chat with friends while playing.
Website: TrilliumCraft - Community website - Home IP Address: 208.122.48.34:25613 Mumble voice server: • Label = TrilliumCraft • Address = 184.154.31.52 • Port = 63120 • Password = _vceFunzEc
Other Features: Large PVP Arena! Jobs! Lots of events weekly! Ranks and classes! Player-shops! McMMO! Mobspawners! 40+ Plugins! Complete protection! Active forum community! iConomy-based shop! Worldguard! Powered by Beastnode! Professional Staff!
